name: Slashed
description: Raised when your validator has been slashed.

name: Node is syncing
description: Raised when your node is still catching up to the rest of the blockchain network in terms of block height.

name: Validator is syncing
description: Raised when your validator is still catching up to the rest of the blockchain network in terms of block height.

name: Validator not active in session
description: Raised if a validator is not active in the current session.

name: Validator is jailed
description: Status of validator jailed/not jailed.

name: New proposal submitted
description: A new proposal has been submitted.

name: Proposal concluded
description: A proposal has been concluded.

name: Not Active in Session
description: Raised when a validator does not participate in a session.

name: Is Disabled
description: Raised when a validator is disabled.

name: Not elected
description: Raised when a validator was not elected for next session.

name: Bonded Amount Changed
description: Raised when the bonded amount of a validator is changed.

name: Offline
description: Raised when an offline event is generated for a validator.

name: Controller Address Change
description: Raised when the controller address changes.

name: Grandpa is Stalled
description: Raised when the grandpa algorithm stalls.

name: New Referendum
description: A new referendum has been submitted.

name: Referendum concluded
description: A referendum has been concluded.

name: Chainlink node: Node Switch
description: Whenever a node being monitored goes down, a back-up Chainlink is started, this alert signifies that.

name: Balance Topped Up
description: Whenever the balance of a node is topped up you will get alerted.

name: Chainlink node: Gas price increases over the node's price limit
description: If the current gas price is higher than the gas limit of the node an alert should be raised.

name: Chainlink Contracts: Consensus Failure
description: An alert will be raised if the number of oracles that have submitted their observations is less than the minimum requirement. Severity is set as warning as from a node operator perspective there is nothing one can do.

name: Node is Peered With Sentinel
description: An alert will be raised if the current node is not peering with the sentinel on the source chain

name: Validator is Peered With Sentinel
description: An alert will be raised if the current node is not peering with the sentinel on the source chain
